query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative approach to music videos transform the medium and influence pop culture during the 1980s and beyond?

query_2.text: How did Whitney Houston's unique vocal style and emotional delivery influence the evolution of pop and R&B music in the 1980s and 1990s?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to constantly reinvent his musical persona reflect the cultural and social changes of the 20th century?

query_4.text: How did Freddie Mercury's unique blend of theatricality and vulnerability in his performances contribute to his enduring legacy as one of rock music's most iconic figures?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's musical evolution from her early work in "Yours Truly" to her more recent albums reflected her personal growth and experiences in the public eye?

query_6.text: How did Bob Marley's personal experiences with social injustice and his Jamaican heritage influence the themes of unity and resistance in his music?
